action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a grassy area with numerous bicycles scattered and parked haphazardly. Some people are sitting or standing around the bicycles, and there are trees and a road in the background.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a black and white photo of a train at a station. The train is facing the camera, and the station platform is visible on the right side. The train has a frontal view with visible headlights, windows, and various control panels. The station has a building in the background with a door and windows.
